name: Harry James Lovett
description:
I’m interested in art, outdoor activities, spirituality, salsa dancing(all dancing), exercise, current events; good conversation, cultural events, travel, reading, gardening cooking.Daily walks to a variety of parks with my Dog am very lovely person who is very gentle in love I am very caring and understanding, I worry so much because am lonely and widow i need good woman to come and complete my happiness and love , and I love my women a lot I’m a real man, and not ready to play Games or for those who will be hurt my feelings I am a widow and I have only 1 the daughter of a woman I am a man I do not lie or cheat on my woman, so any woman, I think I am the type of man to speak with and hear each other voice and we can continue to see each other there
and know more.
